website_summaries.verdict: Simple and inexpensive ice fishing shelter made for 2 people, but not significantly insulated.
pros: Uses a 300 denier fabric to ensure durability and toughness
Fits up to 2 people nicely with dimensions of 60 by 60 inches
Has adjustable ventilation windows to help with airflow while cutting down the wind
Relatively easy to set up and use
Carries a very low price point
cons: Only has a height of 67 inches in the shelter

customer_reviews.title: Great ice hut!
customer_reviews.text: I can't praise this product enough! I've been in rooms on cruise ships that weren't this big! The insulated walls are amazing and they didn't sweat one bit. Got caught up in some light drizzle/freezing rain this morning and it beaded right up and ran off.
customer_reviews.author: JCIII

customer_reviews.title: Quick fish 3
customer_reviews.text: Quick Fish 3. Great ice house. Seems very well built and goes up and down easily. Fit 3 guys inside comfortably . Picture shows fishing area with three 8 inch holes. Ice anchors work great and very easy to use by hand. No regrets and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Don Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Quick fish i 5 - JJ 5
customer_reviews.text: What can I say other then this bad boy is bad to the bone. NiCe just real NicE. Holds up in 25 mh winds to 30 mph gust if you know what your doing and set it up right and use your Mellon while you set it up and use the tie downs they supply or bungee cords of your own on the windy side. Use the door on the none windy side to inter end exit. You should have no problem. Well made HD hub type shelter. Great job Eskimo 👍
customer_reviews.author: JJ5

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS SHACK!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is PERFECT for 1 or 2 people! And what a great price! Took it out for the first time and setup was flawless, even for someone who has never set one up before. It was ups in a minute and protected us from the snow coming down pretty heavy. We were plenty warm and never even started up our heater. This shack is super light weight and extremely easy to carry. Love the velcro windows. Love the door. And lots of room for 2 people to be comfortable. Now to buy a larger one for when the kids come along with us!
customer_reviews.author: J. Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I love the ice house and the company, but when I took the ice house out, onto the lake for the first time, it started falling apart. Rods began to pop out of their holster, and the threaded rods that holds the rods into place when shipped was stripped, making it impossible to fix it. I was told that I need to pay $60 to replace my product. I.e. i was shipped a defective product and now need to pay for their mistakes.
customer_reviews.author: Colten

customer_reviews.title: Blew my expectations away!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely impressed with this shanty! I purchased it in the spring of last year when the price was right. I waited probably 8 months before I actually took this shanty out of its packaging (and that was on the ice). After opening it up - setup was a breeze. I didn’t use any instructions, as everything was self explanatory. I do recommend 2 people... as 1 person opening and taking down this shanty would prove to be quite difficult. The zipper seems to be quality and all the vents/windows are a nice touch. I am seriously impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Soper

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ICE SHELTER
customer_reviews.text: Light and durable fishing shanty. Important to mark the top pop out panel with some colored ribbon. Important to pop the top panel out before the sides then collapse the top first before the sides. Read reviews where some had trouble with these hubs but that is all you have to know. Remember “top first” wheather you are deploying or collapsing. Also read some complaints about the bag being small and difficulty with stowing. If you push the material in between the poles on all 4 sides it will slide right in. I thoroughly field tested this hub on Michigan’s Saginaw Bay this winter and it exceeded my expectations. Quickly becoming the most popular up here.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Navarre

customer_reviews.title: Warm even without a heater
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Setup was fairly easy, even for the first time. Really impressed with the ice anchor pouch and they went in by hand without any problem. Wasn't very windy but kept the snow n hail off me. Left one door open without a heater n still stayed warm. With a heater n door closed you will be shedding layers. Went back in bag without much fuss. Hope it holds up, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Some Jerk

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: The ice tent exceeded our expectations! Well made and sturdy, we expect to get years of use out of this excellent pop-up. We expect it to be easier to set up as we use it. I suggest setting it up and letting it stand for a few days to stretch it out. Rather have it a bit tight than loose fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Dead Head

customer_reviews.title: Fairly good quality for the price, but not the most durable tent
customer_reviews.text: This tent has served us well, but I don't expect it to last past this season. Pros: -easy to set up and use -wind resistant, holds heat well -pretty lightweight Cons: -poles are not as sturdy as expected - one snapped last winter, fifth time using it, and we had to attempt to repair it as we could not get a replacement pole -has to be folded after being collapsed, or it will not fit into the carrying bag -very limited options for hanging lights on the roof (only on the poles, no loops or velcro to attach a light)
customer_reviews.author: Jean Dunkel

customer_reviews.title: Unfolds easily. The ice tie down anchors worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Took it out first time tonight. A little windy. Easier with two people. Unfolds easily. The ice tie down anchors worked perfectly. Some one offered a review on here Bungee cords verse the little nylon tie downs. That worked perfect. 30” bungee. Easy tear down. I’m 6’-1”. I can stand up easily. 2 person with our gear was enough room. It can do 3.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny k

customer_reviews.title: Not for rainy days.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast and I’ve been using it for a few days now. - I use it for general weather protection and not for ice fishing. I had been happy with the tent until today. First time I’ve used it with inclement weather - nothing major, a constant light mist. I just got drips of water dropping on me and my gear thrubthe seams. Maybe this product wasn’t meant to protect in rainy weather, just snow, but it is highly disappointing to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Aprod

customer_reviews.title: Great shack..... but
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time and had a bit of wind (around 15 mph with 25 mph gusts). A corner grommet became distorted and is bent out of shape where the ice anchor goes in. Was disappointed, now will have to have repaired. I don't know if all of them have weak grommets, but this one did. I wish I could write a better review as the light with windows, the set up of the vents, the amount of floorspace, all are really nice on this product. But it couldn't hold up in light wind (by Wyoming standards) perhaps I just got a defective part. IDK.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon k.

customer_reviews.title: One bad window.
customer_reviews.text: Great for our family of four except for one of the windows. As you can see in the picture it came cracked and wrinkled. I'm sure the company would replace it if my husband ever got around to telling them. It's just kinda a pain to have to go through that. It is bulky and heavy but that is too be expected since we got the large insulated one.
customer_reviews.author: Krista H.

customer_reviews.title: This tent IS warmer
customer_reviews.text: The "I" variants of Quickfish do deflect more body heat than the standard versions. This one is suitable for a folding chair and a TV diner stand - it's pretty small. I bought it as a winter smoking shelter but it traps smoke, even with the windows open. I'm not sure what I'll use this tiny tent for now.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Do not expect a lot
customer_reviews.text: If you looking for ice shelter you may buy but couple thing you should know about 1)material is really thin extremely easy to damage 2)with really light rain start leaking at the first fishing trip3) about capacity perfect for 3 anglers far from 6 anglers.fishing with 4 guys really tight really.SO THINK TWICE BEFORE YOU BUY!!!!Will try insulated next year hope I’m not be so disappointed like with this one
customer_reviews.author: Andriy lyubimov

customer_reviews.title: Nice sized windows
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes this tent! Very well made. It has two little openings for air movement that you can open or close, Nice sized windows, too. Very sturdy shelter with flaps around the bottom to keep on the outside and put snow on top of to keep wind out. Plenty of room for a couple of chairs, a small heater and some fishing gear and not feel all cramped in. Maybe even 3 people, depending on the size of the people. Perfect size for us. Folds up nicely into a pack you wear on your back. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jacki

customer_reviews.title: Great shelter.
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight shelter. I love how it blocks the light from outside. It was a pain to open the first time but now that it is broke in goes up easy..
customer_reviews.author: Klingdog

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, BIG
customer_reviews.text: I got the insulated quickfish 3. As an icefishing shelter, it is great! Very big, enough to squeeze 4 average sized persons. It's roomy enough for me to lay down flat on the ground, stand up straight, keep all my gear including sled in the tent, and have 4 holes to fish out of. Kept me warm enough without a heater, great at blocking wind, can even darkhouse adequately for sight fishing. However, for solo fishing so just carrying without a snowmobile, it is a bit too big and too heavy to carry comfortably or set up. Will return the 3 person tent and get the 2 person instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Kim

customer_reviews.title: Non-Insulated Shelter Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: Used this shelter for the first time yesterday and it worked out great. It was 20mph winds and the temps were -15 degrees wind chills. I bought the non-insulated shelter and it kept us very warm with the propane heater inside. The non insulated unit will develop frost on it, so it needs to dry out in the garage or basement prior to putting it back in the carrying case to prevent mold or odor. The ice anchors work great and are relatively easy to put into the ice. There were only two of us fishing in the unit, but it was large enough for us to keep all our gear inside the shelter as well.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Really only fits 1 person and gear
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad who is 65 so he can come ice fishing with my husband and me and still have his own privacy. He loves it. It is easy up and easy down. It is perfect for just him, his chair, heater, and cooler.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get extra tiedowns they will not send you enough and when the wind blows it will break
customer_reviews.text: Not real impressed my father has already called me and it has broken he has only used it twice . He said he was sitting there in the wind blew and broke the pole almost knocked him off his bucket .They should send more tiedowns they only sent two.There should be four tiedowns not two.Not really impressed for almost 200 dollars.Other than that if they would have sent four tiedowns it would have been the best Shanny ever.I’m very upset he only used it twice and it broke I bought it for him for a Christmas gift and he fishes every day.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: winner
customer_reviews.text: Have used this three times and so far It is a winner. Easy set up and take down. Buddy heater keeps it above freezing. Is a bit heavy to haul around but it has alot of room. Only draw back is that it needs two more vents to get rid of condensation.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Moutian Man

customer_reviews.title: Missing rope
customer_reviews.text: Just set it up in the yard as a test before going out on the ice. Seems like a good product so far. Received six ice anchors but did not receive the rope with sliding adjustments that’s mentioned in the instructions. Sure that I can get the the job done with my own rope or bungees, but I do believe you should get everything that you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoBob

customer_reviews.title: This unit should not have been resold !
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this knowing it was used but packaged said it had some blemishes, so today fir the first time I took it out of the box ,the tent was dirty looks like it has burn Mark's in spots on the outside from cinders from a fire ,also the unit is faded ,this wasnt inspected very well , had I known this I would have gone brand new Very Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: jason a lemme

customer_reviews.title: Great one man shack
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect one man shack. You can fit two but it is a tight squeeze. I went fishing and used it as a one man the entire weekend and it is absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sjogren Family

customer_reviews.title: A little heavy and cramped.
customer_reviews.text: If you don't have friends this is the one to buy. But if you want to go out with someone you should get the 3 for sure. Can keep you warm in sub 0 with a heater though.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley beaulieu

customer_reviews.title: Best ice fishing Amazon purchase EVER
customer_reviews.text: Amazing deal on this portable. Cuts the wind and keeps you warm. Big enough for two guys with holes in the corner.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R

customer_reviews.title: Super great price.
customer_reviews.text: Best money ever spent! Light and easy to put up and take down. Warm and bright.
customer_reviews.author: TheGovnr

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little ice tent, just what I needed. Cons. door could be bigger....could be a couple of inches taller/higher.
customer_reviews.author: Tug

customer_reviews.title: Eskimo quickfiah 3
customer_reviews.text: Have not been able to use it yet due to warm weather but I’ve set it up a few times and very impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff’s Outdoors Adventures

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Very great looking product but I would recommend setting up outside don't do it in a small apartment
customer_reviews.author: kevin bouchard

customer_reviews.title: Big and light
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tent! Easy to use. You can also use it for camping, just make sure to bring tarps for the floor
customer_reviews.author: Ulua.kayak

customer_reviews.title: eskimo quickfish 3
customer_reviews.text: this is a very good shelter light enough but should stay warm on a cold day. Seller shipped very fast. I'm pleased with the transaction. My friend had one an it was tough as nails.
customer_reviews.author: Pied Piper

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of gear!
customer_reviews.text: Really works well! Took it out on the first day and it did great in a moderate wind that blew all day. A wall popped in on it in a gust but just tie the guy lines out and you will be fine!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I did have it at 5 stars for simple easy and fast setup plus the price point I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Did have it at 5 stars but the polls ripped through the fabric last year just by setting it up, mind you I only used it one winter and stored it properly. I did have it at 5 stars for simple easy and fast setup plus the price point I bought it at was good
customer_reviews.author: Bman763

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love the tent I wasn’t useing it as a fishing tent I was using this to get a way in the back yard to sit and have a smoke but today it started to rain and it was coming in I was getting dripping on my chairs are wet and very disappointed for the money I paid
customer_reviews.author: Care74

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with Eskimo products! Used this in the fall, winter and now spring! Great investment, durable and very functionable ! Bad A55!
customer_reviews.author: Chgo5

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Ice Shelter
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, high quality ice shelter. I paid attention to previous reviews and ordered the 3 man though I only needed one for 2. Fits 2 people and gear very comfortably. Can be put up and taken down by one person but much easier with 2. Anchors are heavy duty and windows are well placed.
customer_reviews.author: rlafirst

customer_reviews.title: He had another smaller shelter on a sled but said this is his favorite. Also
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this shelter this winter and just loves it. He had another smaller shelter on a sled but said this is his favorite. Also, feels it is easy to popup and likes that more than 1 person fits in the shelter.
customer_reviews.author: Kayak Lover

customer_reviews.title: I'm a new ice fisherman and Its a great starter shanty for beginners (and more)
customer_reviews.text: I'm a new ice fisherman and Its a great starter shanty for beginners (and more). easy to set up and down after I figured out how to do it. lol Its suprisingly warm on the ice inside the shanty due to its black inside. Overrall, good shanty, good value, happy customer..
customer_reviews.author: Marcus B.

customer_reviews.title: Overall great quality and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Overall great quality and easy to set up. Wish the carry bag was a little bigger. It's a hassle to insert the house back into the bag when the inside dew freezes while trying to store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy to Set-Up, But Wouldn't Fit 3 Bigger Guys
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Super easy to haul and to set up. Cons: the material at the bottom isn't very thick, so the air and wind seep in from the floor. Also, this really fits three small-ish guys.In general though, happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: IT'S BIG, IT'S RED, IT'S EASY TO SET UP AND TAKE DOWN. 5 STAR QUALITY ITEM
customer_reviews.text: It arrived 2 days ahead of projected date, it's so much larger than expected, so much better made than we could believe. It's AWESOME, cannot wait for weather to make it possible to use! Will write more after it gets used.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque L Zirtzman

customer_reviews.title: Got to use it a couple times and like it. would be close if 2 people were ...
customer_reviews.text: Got to use it a couple times and like it. would be close if 2 people were in it but great for 1 person and 2 poles. I like it because it stores in the closet and fits in the cab of my truck.
customer_reviews.author: T. E. Holzinger

customer_reviews.title: Really fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this tent. Set up and take down are a breeze, and it does a great job blocking the wind. It's small, it definitely is perfect for 2 but would be crowded with 3.
customer_reviews.author: Drew P.

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it'll do a better job than my hunting blind
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room for two. I'm sure it'll do a better job than my hunting blind, lol.
customer_reviews.author: James Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: It is a very great product the eskimo 6 is very nice n spacious and very light weight u can carry over ur shoulders like a backpack easy to pop up n set up after getting used to its size I'd say take ur time a few times after u get comfortable with it it's a breeze no it is not insulated but u still stay warm in it really well
customer_reviews.author: Lenny haughn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really like it but wasn't as easy to set up as they show.
customer_reviews.author: Ron B

customer_reviews.title: Greatfor smokers on chilly climates too
customer_reviews.text: We live in AZ and obviously don't ice fish, but this has been perfect for the chilly nights or windy days. We smoke outside, so with a heater this unit works great. Well made, easy to erect.
customer_reviews.author: RWinAZ

customer_reviews.title: Eskimo
customer_reviews.text: Very good I'm happy with it can't wait to get it out on the ice 💪💪
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan rivera

customer_reviews.title: Stay warm while ice fishing.
customer_reviews.text: Took it ice fishing. There were three of us and it easily has room for one more and two more if necessary. This can also be used as a winter hut. It does not re-pack easily. Would like to see a top load cover rather than an end load. Set up and take down is super easy and quick.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had it in really cold weather and a propane heater is all you need to keep warm out on the ice. The only thing that concerned us is the second time we used one of the pop out pole areas got tangled and it took 15 minutes to fix. Hoping this doesn’t happen often, maybe we collapsed wrong. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bohaty

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Avoid, popped the tent up once, noticed metal hub was cracked and cut putter shell. Looked to return it but cost $50-60 to return, almost half the original purcasing price. Poor quality, multiple needle holes around stitching letting light in, as such water would also be able to access interior.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Raab

customer_reviews.title: Best for this price!
customer_reviews.text: Strong body & textile. More than enought for 3 big man like me 6.1 Many windows. Great shelter for ice fishing or can be placed in summer!
customer_reviews.author: Veranika

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. He says it has plenty of room ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas. He has trouble setting it up on the ice by himself- especially on a windy day... but he loves to use it with his buddies. Great quality. He says it has plenty of room and keeps them warm! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Yetmar

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Yet to use it but it was simple to set up and year down. Seems to be of great quality.
customer_reviews.author: April T

customer_reviews.title: fishit
customer_reviews.text: absolutely awesome plenty of room easily set up and taken down. Tough enough for wyoming winter 30mph no problem
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok. Not the best.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the quickfish 3 and only had it for 4 days and already the black is coming off and is fading. I called Eskimo which are great service and they sent me a new one. Hopefully this new shanty dosnt do the same thing or I will be switching to otter or clam.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Brusseau

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, so easy to put up and take down.Does great in high wind.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Herring

customer_reviews.title: Durable canvas
customer_reviews.text: Fishing is more fun when your out of the wind. Durable canvas and enough room for 2.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Only time I put it up was in the house, Spring came early this year and I did not get it until after the ice was no longer safe to go out on and try. Easy set up, very roomy, no noticeable flaws in any of the seams. Can't wait for next year to put it to use.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Heckman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We use ours in ND and it is great, plenty of room for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is questionable,
customer_reviews.text: This shanty takes only a few seconds to put up. But I purchased this for a Christmas present for my boyfriend, and when he pulled on the top, one of the fiberglass poles immediately snapped.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ice fishing hut
customer_reviews.text: My favorite piece of ice fishing gear. Sets up quick and takes down just as easy
customer_reviews.author: Angela E Plum

customer_reviews.title: Good product enjoy it a lot
customer_reviews.text: The product is great I like the mobility I have with it being so light weight and the stakes are really good at holding it to the ice. Unfortunately I found some flaws fast it’s very hard to setup until the polls are broken in and the material around the skirt rips easy.
customer_reviews.author: jason foster

customer_reviews.title: well made.
customer_reviews.text: Only fished out of this once so far, but I like it. popping it up takes some effort, but taking it down and folding it up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I don't use mine for ice fishing but just as a large tent. Much faster and easier to set up, more space for my cot and heater. (Note that a propane heater gets cold and won't stay working long, I use electric) Overall I've been very happy with my purchase, strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeromy

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Hits 80 degrees in about 5 minutes at 20 degrees F. outside with my mr. buddy heater.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod R.

customer_reviews.title: Great but missing important equipment
customer_reviews.text: I love the shelter. I can open and close it on my own. Eskimo forgot a strap on one side that makes that side very hard to open. It would be 5 stars if they had better quality control. It makes me wonder what else they might have missed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great easy up shelter. Warm with heater and doesn't drip.
customer_reviews.author: cdemarse

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious and sets up in under 2-3 minutes with a single person
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time, appears to be good quality. Can't wait to hit the ice...
customer_reviews.author: Kian Bryce Biles

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: Good shelter but I am 6'5 with boots in and could not stand up inside. If you are over 6 foot you will need a taller hut
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves!!! Stays warm and toasty easy to put up!!
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: It's nice to have the option to get out if the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to have the option to get out if the wind and snow. It does get condensation that drips down from the roof with a heater running.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary L.

customer_reviews.title: You won't be unhappy with this Shack
customer_reviews.text: This shack is awesome. Easy set up and take down. Very roomy. Easy to heat
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great ice fishing shack
customer_reviews.text: Great ice fishing shack, set it up at home before getting on the ice. Kind of hard to get back into the bag. Really love it
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Sets up very fast & tears down just as easy. It is very well insulated & warm
customer_reviews.text: This Eskimo fish tent is just what the manufacturer claimed. Sets up very fast & tears down just as easy. It is very well insulated & warm. Great product..would recommend. Storage pouches inside also come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Jekubik

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and spacious
customer_reviews.text: Spacious, warm, and easy to put up and take down
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Good for Short term use
customer_reviews.text: Poles are considered a wear part and not covered under warranty. A pole shattered during a fourth set up. Hmmmmm. Thought it was nice the first 3 set ups
Works amazing! Just wish it had a clip on the shoulder straps to tighten on my chest
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and warm
customer_reviews.text: Could probably fish more than 3 if you wanted. It keeps me warm. It’s also really easy to pop up/take down. I do it by myself all the time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best fishing hut. Very warm because it’s insulated.
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than I thought. I put it in my jet sled and I was able to get out on the ice. Kind of too big to carry on my back. Two people can easily carry it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to set up and take down by one person.
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to open and close. Can't wait for the ice.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L. Melle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! Easy setup/tear down. Perfect for 1-3 people to fish.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas White

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: The product is well made with quality materials... I'm really happy with it. I did not have a chance to use it yet out on the ice because the weather has been quite warm lately.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Broken pole
customer_reviews.text: Ceiling pole snapped second use. Having trouble finding replacement pole for the 5i quickfish. 24105
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for ice fishing!
customer_reviews.text: Room enough for two adults + gear for the day
customer_reviews.author: STEPHANIE

customer_reviews.title: This is a good ice shelter for two people and some ice fishing ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good ice shelter for two people and some ice fishing equipment. Good compromise between weight and size. I used a Quickfish 2 for a couple years and found it was a little small for two people and equipment. The two doors make it easier to get in and out without tripping over each other. Sets up easily once you get the knack of it. I go the one without the insulation lining to save weight.
customer_reviews.author: RALPH W LARSEN

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I can hid in this thing all day and my wife never finds me.
customer_reviews.author: G C

customer_reviews.title: so much room and heated up nicely with a small Buddy Heater
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, used it up at Lake of the Woods, MN. I did use ice anchors but haven't needed to use side tie downs yet. There was two of us... so much room and heated up nicely with a small Buddy Heater. Set up and take down easy, quick, and no hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Dyrbye

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it on the ice but I did set it up in my living room. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a gift for my son and he is very happy with the pop-up shanty
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift for my son and he is very happy with the pop-up shanty.
customer_reviews.author: rlmoore1

customer_reviews.title: Great shanty
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for two people. Plenty of fishing/equipment space. Set up is simple. If your trying to decide between the qf2 and this, buy this. Definitely worth the extra money
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! So easy to set up and take down. Fits all four of us with room to spare!
customer_reviews.author: jessica hill

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Support Beams
customer_reviews.text: I used my Eskimo maybe 4 times, and then one of the support beams shattered when I was setting up. It still works, but one side doesn't really stay out or supported, so it's become more of a pain in my butt.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Laska

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product, holds heat in wonderfully. Easily packs up for storage. Recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: Taryn

customer_reviews.title: Eskimo customer service takes a long time to respond. Costs $9.99 for a new pole plus shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t even owned it two months or used it 10 times and a hub pole already snapped.
customer_reviews.author: Trev

product_meta.title: Eskimo Quickfish Portable Ice Fishing Shelter
product_meta.description: Sometimes the original is tough to beat. The QuickFish is the original when it comes to hub-style ice fishing shelters. There’s good reason we haven’t changed much on this shelter over the years—sometimes you just get it right the first time. Sturdy poles, easy setup, lightweight, and built to last. The QuickFish 3 gets the job done, time and time again. Own an original, own a QuickFish.
feature_bullets: Everything fits into a cinch carrying bag that can easily be carried on your back. 60-Second Set-Up. SELF-TAPPING ICE ANCHORS: Easier to grip, and won't bend under pressure
Mesh storage pockets to keep essential fishing gear handy. Single door with strong durable YKK zipper. Extra-long skirt helps eliminate drafts and keep elements out.
Heavy-duty material sewn over corner joints for reinforcement. Adjust your shelter's ventilation with detachable hook and loop windows
300 Denier IceTight fabric with a 59 percent higher thread count vs comparable shelters
Includes 6 self-tapping ice anchors that are easier to grip and will not bend under pressure
2 person capacity with set-up size of 60" x 60" and 67" high and elbow room of 76" x 76"
Single door with strong durable YKK zipper
Adjust your shelter's ventilation with 4 detachable hook and loop windows
